tasks.task_description: Create inference script (predict.py) to load trained model and generate predictions
Add prediction output conversion from DESS format to DimABSA submission format
Create test script to verify inference works correctly
Create Kaggle inference notebook for generating submissions
Test inference on sample data and verify output format
Document inference usage and submission process

description: Phase 4: Create inference pipeline to generate predictions on test data and create submission file for DimABSA competition
context: Created predict.py inference script that loads trained model, runs predictions on test data, and generates output in DimABSA format with Aspect, Opinion, and VA scores

Created kaggle_inference.ipynb notebook with step-by-step instructions for running inference and generating submission file. The notebook handles model loading, prediction generation, and submission file creation.
Created PHASE4_INFERENCE.md documentation with complete guide for running inference, generating submissions, and submitting to competition. Includes troubleshooting and expected performance metrics.
All Phase 4 files committed and pushed to GitHub. Model files excluded from git (too large). Users should upload trained model separately to Kaggle as a dataset.
